metadata.Title: CVE-2021-20284 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low.
metadata.Description: A flaw was found in GNU Binutils 2.35.1, where there is a heap-based buffer overflow in _bfd_elf_slurp_secondary_reloc_section in elf.c due to the number of symbols not calculated correctly. The highest threat from this vulnerability is to system availability.

notes.Note: mdeslaur> code isn't present in focal and earlier, need to investigate if reproducer works

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
